title: I NEED HELP I want to change my email but I cannot remember my password of my mail
body: I want to change my email account league of legends the problem is that I do not remember the password and so I can not change my mail , already tried everything and I can not . I need someone to help me want to change it but I can not {{item:3151}}   {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}  and I can not check my email in any way. I have a lot of time playing League of Legends and do not want to lose this account help please.

replies.body:
As *Hyperion3182* mentioned, you'll want to reach out to our account specialists who can work with you to resolve this. Submit a ticket with [this form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and fill out as much information as you can recall about the account. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hello,
Have you contacted your email provider support? They usually have security questions like "name of the first pet" etc., in order to recover your mail access. 
In the worst case, send a request to Player Support and explain the whole situation with as many details as possible. 
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
